aboutRestaurants.west: Enjoy views of West London alongside sophisticated and classic dishes from our rotisserie and grill; all cooked in our open kitchen.
aboutRestaurants.east: Enjoy views of East London, culinary cocktails and innovative seasonal dishes in a creative and relaxing dining and bar space.
aboutRestaurants.bar: Enjoy views of London in our Bar with a glass of champagne or wine in a creative and relaxing bar space.
